metadata.description: Binary flag mapping for Phase 2 data quality issues

flag_mapping.1: Contradictory values found in the same row (window_seat=True AND aisle_seat=True).
flag_mapping.2: Departure Date/Time after Arrival Date/Time detected.
flag_mapping.4: Mismatch between Layovers count and Layover Locations list length.

1.description: Contradictory values found in the same row (window_seat=True AND aisle_seat=True).
1.fix_approach: Ensure mutually exclusive boolean fields are correctly populated.

2.description: Departure Date/Time after Arrival Date/Time detected.
2.fix_approach: Correct the chronological order of departure and arrival times.

4.description: Mismatch between Layovers count and Layover Locations list length.
4.fix_approach: Ensure the number of layovers matches the number of layover locations.
